name: The Mule
description:
The Mule

You and your crew are smuggling 400 Kilos of Cocaine across the Mexican Border into the US. The coke you are smuggling has street valve of $11.2 Million and have now been spotted by US Border Patrol who are now giving chase. You have 100 seconds to get $11.2 Million worth of coke into the US and out run Border Patrol. Every crash will cause you to lose 8 Kilos as well as decrease your time. Good Luck and hope you don’t have to get a visit from El Pescador (he is a complete psychopath and loves to force his victims to listen to Justin Bieber, Creed, Limp Bizkit and Nickelback for hours on end).

Controls:

Space: Gas

Left Arrow: Left

Right Arrow: Right
